A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (Spoiler Free) While this movie does have some flaws\, such as comedy being used way too much\, I genuinely think this was a great movie. There were interesting plot twists that I would never have expected\, which I enjoyed. I do not understand the hate towards it at the moment. People who complaining that they have many questions still left unanswered\, but seem to fail to realize this is still only the second movie in the trilogy......
